verses.verse: David<WH1732> again gathered together<WH622> all the chosen<WH977> men of Israel,<WH3478> thirty<WH7970> thousand.<WH505>

They set<WH7392> the ark<WH727> of God<WH430> on a new<WH2319> cart,<WH5699> and brought<WH5375> it out of the house<WH1004> of Abinadab<WH41> that was in the hill:<WH1390> and Uzzah<WH5798> and Ahio,<WH283> the sons<WH1121> of Abinadab,<WH41> drove<WH5090> the new<WH2319> cart.<WH5699>

They brought<WH5375> it out of the house<WH1004> of Abinadab,<WH41> which was in the hill,<WH1390> with<WH5973> the ark<WH727> of God:<WH430> and Ahio<WH283> went<WH1980> before<WH6440> the ark.<WH727>

David<WH1732> and all the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478> played<WH7832> before<WH6440> Yahweh<WH3068> with all kinds of instruments made of fir<WH1265> wood,<WH6086> and with harps,<WH3658> and with stringed<WH5035> instruments,<WH8596> and with tambourines, and with castanets,<WH4517> and with cymbals.<WH6767>

When they came<WH935> to the threshing<WH1637> floor of Nacon,<WH5225> Uzzah<WH5798> reached<WH7971> for the ark<WH727> of God,<WH430> and took hold<WH270> of it;<WH1241> for the cattle stumbled.<WH8058>
The anger<WH639> of Yahweh<WH3068> was kindled<WH2734> against Uzzah;<WH5798> and God<WH430> struck<WH5221> him there for his error;<WH7944> and there he died<WH4191> by the ark<WH727> of God.<WH430>
David<WH1732> was displeased,<WH2734> because Yahweh<WH3068> had broken<WH6556> forth<WH6555> on Uzzah;<WH5798> and he called<WH7121> that place<WH4725> Perez Uzzah,<WH5798> to this day.<WH3117>
David<WH1732> was afraid<WH3372> of Yahweh<WH3068> that day;<WH3117> and he said,<WH559> "How shall the ark<WH727> of Yahweh<WH3068> come to me?<WH935>"

So David<WH1732> would<WH14> not move<WH5493> the ark<WH727> of Yahweh<WH3068> to be with him in the city<WH5892> of David;<WH1732> but David<WH1732> carried it aside<WH5186> into the house<WH1004> of Obed-Edom<WH5654> the Gittite.<WH1663>

The ark<WH727> of Yahweh<WH3068> remained<WH3427> in the house<WH1004> of Obed-Edom<WH5654> the Gittite<WH1663> three<WH7969> months:<WH2320> and Yahweh<WH3068> blessed<WH1288> Obed-Edom,<WH5654> and all his house.<WH1004>

It was told<WH5046> king<WH4428> David,<WH1732> saying,<WH559> "Yahweh<WH3068> has blessed<WH1288> the house<WH1004> of Obed-Edom,<WH5654> and all that pertains to him,<WH727> because of the ark of God.<WH430>" David<WH1732> went<WH3212> and brought up<WH5927> the ark<WH727> of God<WH430> from the house<WH1004> of Obed-Edom<WH5654> into the city<WH5892> of David<WH1732> with joy.<WH8057>
It was so,<WH5375> that, when those who bore the ark<WH727> of Yahweh<WH3068> had gone<WH6805> six<WH8337> paces,<WH6806> he sacrificed<WH2076> an ox<WH7794> and a fattened calf.<WH4806>
David<WH1732> danced<WH3769> before<WH6440> Yahweh<WH3068> with all his might;<WH5797> and David<WH1732> was clothed<WH2296> in a linen<WH906> ephod.<WH646>
So David<WH1732> and all the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478> brought up<WH5927> the ark<WH727> of Yahweh<WH3068> with shouting,<WH8643> and with the sound<WH6963> of the trumpet.<WH7782>

It was so,<WH727> as the ark of Yahweh<WH3068> came<WH935> into the city<WH5892> of David,<WH1732> that Michal<WH4324> the daughter<WH1323> of Saul<WH7586> looked<WH8259> out at the window,<WH2474> and saw<WH7200> king<WH4428> David<WH1732> leaping<WH6339> and dancing<WH3769> before<WH6440> Yahweh;<WH3068> and she despised<WH959> him in her heart.<WH3820>

They brought<WH935> in the ark<WH727> of Yahweh,<WH3068> and set<WH3322> it in its place,<WH4725> in the midst<WH8432> of the tent<WH168> that David<WH1732> had pitched<WH5186> for it;<WH1732> and David offered<WH5927> burnt offerings<WH5930> and peace offerings<WH5930> before<WH6440> Yahweh.<WH3068>

When David<WH1732> had made an end<WH3615> of offering<WH5927> the burnt offering<WH5930> and the peace offerings,<WH8002> he blessed<WH1288> the people<WH5971> in the name<WH8034> of Yahweh<WH3068> of Armies.<WH6635>

He gave<WH2505> to all the people,<WH5971> even among the whole multitude<WH5971> of Israel,<WH3478> both to men<WH376> and women,<WH802> to everyone<WH376> a<WH259> portion<WH2471> of bread,<WH3899> dates,<WH829> and raisins.<WH809> So all the people<WH5971> departed<WH3212> everyone<WH376> to his house.<WH1004>

Then David<WH1732> returned<WH7725> to bless<WH1288> his household.<WH1004> Michal<WH4324> the daughter<WH1323> of Saul<WH7586> came out<WH3318> to meet<WH7125> David,<WH1732> and said,<WH559> "How glorious<WH3513> the king<WH4428> of Israel<WH3478> was today,<WH3117> who uncovered<WH1540> himself today<WH3117> in the eyes<WH5869> of the handmaids<WH519> of his servants,<WH5650> as one<WH259> of the vain fellows<WH7386> shamelessly<WH1540> uncovers himself!<WH1540>"

David<WH1732> said<WH559> to Michal,<WH4324> "It was before<WH6440> Yahweh,<WH3068> who chose<WH977> me above your father,<WH1> and above all his house,<WH1004> to appoint<WH6680> me prince<WH5057> over the people<WH5971> of Yahweh,<WH3068> over Israel.<WH3478> Therefore will I celebrate<WH7832> before<WH6440> Yahweh.<WH3068>
I will be yet more vile<WH7043> than this,<WH2063> and will be base<WH8217> in my own sight.<WH5869> But of the handmaids<WH519> of whom you have spoken,<WH559> they shall honor me.<WH3513>"
Michal<WH4324> the daughter<WH1323> of Saul<WH7586> had no child<WH2056> to the day<WH3117> of her death.<WH4194>
